name: Shifted
description: Shifted is a clone of the popular puzzle game Bejeweled. This game requires quick thinking and quick responses. The goal of the game is that you have to shift columns up and down to make combinations of gems on the center row. The higher the combination, the more points you will earn.
alsoFor: ColecoVision, Commodore PET/CBM, Vectrex, VIC-20, ZX81 | Combined View
